primary_research_focus.title: Angle 6: Agent Protocol Design for Integrating Human Operator Intent and Oversight in Automated DER Coordination
primary_research_focus.core_question: How can agent communication protocols be designed to effectively integrate human operator intent and enable robust oversight in the coordination of automated Distributed Energy Resources (DERs), particularly in maintenance or operational contexts?
primary_research_focus.subfocus: Designing conceptual frameworks, interaction patterns, and communication semantics for human-agent teaming in DER management.

human_oversight_supervision.description: Papers focusing on mechanisms for human supervision and oversight of autonomous or automated agent actions.
